charges.charge_description: 18:1546.F  FRAUD AND MISUSE OF VISAS/PERMITS.  On or about 7/28/16, in Iroquois County, defendant did knowingly possess documents for entry or employment in the U.S., which the defendant knew to be falsely made, in violation of 18 USC 1546(a).(1)

8:1326A.F  REENTRY OF DEPORTED ALIENS.  On or about 1/4/17, in Champaign County, defendant, who was a citizen of Mexico who had previously been deported, was found in the U.S. without having obtained consent in violation of 8 USC 1326(a).(2)

8:1326.F  On or about 1/4/17, defendant did illegally reenter the United States and misuse visas , permits and other documents in violation of Title 18, USC Section 1546(a) and Illegal re-entry after prior deportation in violation of Title 8, USC Section 1326.
